The Research Engineering Group (REG) is a team of data scientists, software engineers, and compute specialists who work together to buiild tools and software to support research. We work across many themes, such as health, environment and sustainability, and defence and national security.
If you want to see some of the work weâ€™re doing, check out the various projects on our GitHub page! We also run Turing Data Stories, a series of short, engaging, and accessible stories about Turing research.
